sentence.Network_en: Passeriformes having relatively simple vocal organs and little power of song : clamatorial birds.
sentence.Network_cn: 有相对简单的发音器官和较差的鸣唱能力;叫禽类鸟.

means.word_mean: 1. largest order of birds comprising about half the known species; rooks; finches; sparrows; tits; warblers; robins; wrens; swallows; etc.; the four suborders are Eurylaimi and Tyranni and Menurae and Oscines or Passeres
